data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'CDS Dados Cabeçalho Monitor InBound'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@Metadata.allowExtensions: true
define root view entity /EXEDMINB/I_NFeMonitorH
  as select from    /EXEDMINB/I_NFEHEADER    as _NFeHeader
    left outer join /EXEDMINB/I_NFEProtocolo as _NFEProtocolo on _NFeHeader.Id = _NFEProtocolo.Id


  composition [0..*] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeMonitorI as _Item
  association [0..*] to /EXEDMINB/I_HISTORICO   as _Historico              on  $projection.ChaveNFe = _Historico.IdNfe


  association        to /EXEDMINB/I_NFE_STATUS_DESC    as _StatusNFeDesc   on  $projection.StatusNFe = _StatusNFeDesc.Status
  association        to /EXEDMINB/T_ATIVIDADES         as _Atividades      on  $projection.Atividade = _Atividades.atividade
  association        to I_CompanyCodeVH                as _CompanyCodeVH   on  $projection.Empresa = _CompanyCodeVH.CompanyCode
  association        to I_BR_BusinessPlace             as _BusinessPlaceVH on  $projection.Empresa        = _BusinessPlaceVH.CompanyCode
                                                                           and $projection.LocalDeNegocio = _BusinessPlaceVH.Branch


{
      //Dados Nota Fiscal
  key _NFeHeader.Id                   as ChaveNFe,

      case _NFeHeader.statusProc
        when 1 then 'Erro'
        when 2 then 'Pendente'
        when 3 then 'Sucesso'
        else 'Erro'
      end                             as Status,
      case
        when _NFeHeader.statusProc is not initial then _NFeHeader.statusProc
        else 1
      end                             as StatusCriticality,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'StatusNFeDescricao' ]
      _NFEProtocolo.cStat             as StatusNFe,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CompanyCodeName' ]
      _NFeHeader.bukrs                as Empresa,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'BusinessPlaceName' ]
      _NFeHeader.branch               as LocalDeNegocio,
      _NFeHeader.processo             as ProcessoSAP,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'AtividadeDescricao' ]
      _NFeHeader.atividade            as Atividade,
      _NFeHeader.nNF                  as NumeroNFe,
      _NFeHeader.serie                as Serie,
      _NFeHeader.dhEmi                as DataEmissao,
      _NFeHeader.migo                 as EntradaMercadoria,
      _NFeHeader.miro                 as EntradaFatura,
      _NFeHeader.delivery             as Delivery,

      //Dados Emitente
      _NFeHeader._Issuer.CNPJ         as Emitente,
      _NFeHeader._Issuer.xNome        as NomeEmitente,

      //Dados Destinatario
      _NFeHeader._Recipient.CNPJ_CPF  as Destinatario,
      _NFeHeader._Recipient.xNome     as NomeDestinatario,

      //Dados Valores
      cast( 'BRL' as abap.cuky( 5 ) ) as moeda,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vNF      as ValorTotalNFe,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vICMS    as ValorTotalICMS,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vIPI     as ValorTotalIPI,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vST      as ValorTotalICMSST,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vFrete   as ValorFrete,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vSeg     as ValorSeguro,
      _NFeHeader._ICMSTaxTot.vOutro   as ValorOutrasDesp,

      _Atividades.descricao           as AtividadeDescricao,
      _StatusNFeDesc.Descricao        as StatusNFeDescricao,
      _CompanyCodeVH.CompanyCodeName,
      _BusinessPlaceVH.BusinessPlaceName,


      _Item,
      _Historico

}
/*+[internal] {
"BASEINFO":
{
"FROM":
[
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFEHEADER",
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFEICMSTAXTOT",
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFEISSUER",
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFEPROTOCOLO",
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFERECIPIENT",
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFE_STATUS_DESC",
"I_BR_BUSINESSPLACE",
"I_COMPANYCODEVH"
],
"ASSOCIATED":
[
"/EXEDMINB/I_HISTORICO",
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFEMONITORI"
],
"BASE":
[],
"ANNO_REF":
[],
"SCALAR_FUNCTION":
[],
"VERSION":0,
"ANNOREF_EVALUATION_ERROR":""
}
}*/
